spiritsExplanation:
The workout titled "Climbing Cardio Row" suggests a focus on rhythm and climbing intervals, which aligns with the "Flow & Rhythm" spirit. This is supported by the metadata mentioning "Climb up in rhythm with Dani" and a playlist featuring soul and Motown music, which typically supports rhythmic movement. These elements justify a score of 0.75.

The image shows rowing on a body of water, indicative of an "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit, particularly as it aligns well with rowing-based activities in natural settings. This visual element, combined with the title's suggestion of 'climbing' or progression, supports a score of 0.7.

The "Soothing & Restorative" spirit is supported by the "breathe" workout type and a low intensity level (1 out of 3), suggesting a focus on a more relaxed, restorative session. This justifies a score of 0.5.

Other spirits such as "High-Energy & Intense" and "Structured & Disciplined" are less applicable due to the lower intensity and rhythmic emphasis, which focuses more on flow than structured progression.
